items.title: Type
items.value: Inline, Valve-in-head, Single downdraft, 3-speed manual, helical

items.title: Engine Number Location
items.value: On boss on right side of engine to rear of distributor.

items.title: Lubrication
items.value: Pressure to all bearings excluding wrist pin
